 3215:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links]);
 3216:             true ->
 3217:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links])
 3218:          end,
 3219:     receive
 3220:         {T2, R2e, error, BadOpt2} ->
 3221:             badopt = BadOpt2,
 3222:             ok
 3223:     end,
 3224:

 3226:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, links]);

 3230:     receive

 3232:             badopt = BadOpt2b,

 3346: 
 3347: spawn_request_monitor_demonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3348:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3349:     BlockFun = fun () ->
 3350:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3351:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, 1000),
 3352:                        ok
 3353:                end,
 3354: 
 3355:     %% Block receiver node...
 3356:     spawn_request(Node, BlockFun, [{priority,max}, link]),
 3357:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3358: 
 3359:     erlang:yield(),
 3360:     R = spawn_request(Node, timer, sleep, [10000], [monitor]),
 3361:     %% Should not be possible to demonitor
 3362:     %% before operation has succeeded...
 3363:     {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3364:     false = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]), %% Should be ignored by VM...
 3365:     receive
 3366:         {spawn_reply, R, ok, P} ->
 3367:             {monitors, [{process,P}]} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3368:             true = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]),
 3369:             {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3370:             exit(P, kill)
 3371:     end,
 3372:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3373:     ok.
 3374: 
 3375: spawn_request_monitor_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3376:     %% Early child exit...
 3377:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3378:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [monitor, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3379:     receive
 3380:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3381:             receive
 3382:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3383:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3384:             end
 3385:     end,
 3386:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3387:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, monitor]),
 3388:     receive
 3389:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3390:             receive
 3391:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3392:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3393:             end
 3394:     end,
 3395:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3396:     ok.
 3397: 
 3398: spawn_request_link_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3399:     %% Early child exit...
 3400:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3401:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3402:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, link]),
 3403:     receive
 3404:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3405:             receive
 3406:                 {'EXIT', P1, Reason1} ->
 3407:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3408:             end
 3409:     end,
 3410:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3411:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [link, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3412:     receive
 3413:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3414:             receive
 3415:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3416:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3417:             end
 3418:     end,
 3419:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3420:     ok.
 3421: 
 3422: spawn_request_link_parent_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3423:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), false),
 3424:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3425:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, false),
 3426:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3427:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3428: 
 3429: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_compound_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3430:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), true),
 3431:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3432:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, true),
 3433:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3434:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3435: 
 3436: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, CompoundExitReason) ->
 3437:     %% Early parent exit...
 3438:     Tester = self(),
 3439: 
 3440:     ExitReason = if CompoundExitReason -> "kaboom";
 3441:                     true -> kaboom
 3442:                  end,
 3443: 
 3444:     verify_nc(node()),
 3445: 
 3446:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3447:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3448: 
 3449:     ParentFun = case node() == Node of
 3450:                     true ->
 3451:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3452:                                 spawn_request(?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3453:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3454:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3455:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3456:                         end;
 3457:                     false ->
 3458:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3459:                                 spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3460:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3461:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3462:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3463:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3464:                         end
 3465:                 end,
 3466:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3467:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3468:                                             %% Give parent some work to do when
 3469:                                             %% exiting and by this increase
 3470:                                             %% possibilities for races...
 3471:                                             T = ets:new(x,[]),
 3472:                                             ets:insert(T, lists:map(fun (I) ->
 3473:                                                                             {I,I}
 3474:                                                                     end,
 3475:                                                                     lists:seq(1,10000))),
 3476:                                             ParentFun(N rem 10) end,
 3477:                                     [{priority, max}])
 3478:                   end,
 3479:                   lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 3480:     N = gather_parent_exits(ExitReason, false),
 3481:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3482:                     fun () ->
 3483:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3484:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3485:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3486:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3487:                                       end, processes())
 3488:                     end),
 3489:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3490:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3491:                       (_) ->
 3492:                           ok
 3493:                   end, CFs),
 3494:     Comment =
 3495:         "Got "
 3496:         ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3497:         ++ if node() == Node -> " node local";
 3498:                   true -> " node remote"
 3499:            end
 3500:         ++ if CompoundExitReason -> " \"kaboom\"";
 3501:               true -> " \'kaboom\'"
 3502:            end
 3503:         ++ " exits!",
 3504:     erlang:display(Comment),
 3505:     Comment.
 3506: 
 3507: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3508:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3509:     N = 1000,
 3510:     ExitCounter = spawn(Node, fun exit_counter/0),
 3511:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 3512:                           spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node)
 3513:                   end,
 3514:                   lists:seq(1, N)),
 3515:     ResRef = make_ref(),
 3516:     ExitCounter ! {get_results, self(), ResRef},
 3517:     Cmnt = receive
 3518:                {ResRef, CntMap} ->
 3519:                    lists:flatten(
 3520:                      ["In total ", integer_to_list(N), " exits. ",
 3521:                       "Detected exits: ",
 3522:                       maps:fold(fun (ExitReason, Count, "") ->
 3523:                                         io_lib:format("~p exit ~p times",
 3524:                                                       [ExitReason, Count]);
 3525:                                     (ExitReason, Count, Acc) ->
 3526:                                         [Acc, io_lib:format("; ~p exit ~p times",
 3527:                                                             [ExitReason, Count])]
 3528:                                 end,
 3529:                                 "",
 3530:                                 CntMap),
 3531:                       "."])
 3532:            end,
 3533:     io:format("~s~n", [Cmnt]),
 3534:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3535:     {comment, Cmnt}.
 3536: 
 3537: exit_counter() ->
 3538:     true = register(exit_counter, self()),
 3539:     exit_counter(#{}).
 3540: 
 3541: exit_counter(CntMap) ->
 3542:     receive
 3543:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3544:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3545:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3546:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3547:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3548:     end.
 3549: 
 3550: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3551:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3552:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3553:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3554:                        receive
 3555:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3556:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3557:                        end
 3558:                end,
 3559:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3560:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3561:                                                               ChildFun,
 3562:                                                               [link,
 3563:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3564:                                        exit(bye)
 3565:                                end),
 3566:     receive
 3567:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3568:             bye = Reason,
 3569:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3570:     end,
 3571:     ok.
 3572: 
 3573: 
 3574: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3575:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3576:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3577:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3578:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3579:     try
 3580:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3581:     catch
 3582:         error:badarg ->
 3583:             ok
 3584:     end,
 3585:     try
 3586:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3587:     catch
 3588:         error:badarg ->
 3589:             ok
 3590:     end,
 3591: 
 3592:     verify_nc(node()),
 3593: 
 3594:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3595:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3596: 
 3597: 
 3598:     TotOps = 1000,
 3599:     Tester = self(),
 3600: 
 3601:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3602:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3603:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3604:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3605:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3606:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3607:                             true ->
 3608:                                 ok;
 3609:                             false ->
 3610:                                 receive
 3611:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3612:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3613:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3614:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3615:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3616:                                 after
 3617:                                     0 ->
 3618:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3619:                                 end
 3620:                         end
 3621:                 end,
 3622:     %% Parent exit early...
 3623:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3624:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3625:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3626:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3627:                   end,
 3628:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3629:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3630:     %% Parent exit late...
 3631:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3632:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3633:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3634:                                             receive
 3635:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3636:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3637:                                             after
 3638:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3639:                                             end
 3640:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3641:                   end,
 3642:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3643:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3644:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3645:                     fun () ->
 3646:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3647:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3648:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3649:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3650:                                       end, processes())
 3651:                     end),
 3652:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3653:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3654:                       (_) ->
 3655:                           ok
 3656:                   end, CFs),
 3657:     %% Parent exit early...
 3658:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3659:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3660:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3661:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3662:                   end,
 3663:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3664:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3665:     %% Parent exit late...
 3666:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3667:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3668:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 3669:                                             receive
 3670:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3671:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3672:                                             after
 3673:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3674:                                             end
 3675:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3676:                   end,
 3677:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3678:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3679:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3680:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 3681:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 3682:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 3683:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 3684:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 3685:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 3686:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 3687:     {comment, C}.
 3688: 
 3689: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 3690:   Child = self(),
 3691:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3692:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3693:                         receive
 3694:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 3695:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 3696:                         end
 3697:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 3698:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 3699: 
 3700: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 3701:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3702:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 3703: 
 3704: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 3705:     receive
 3706:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 3707:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 3708:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 3709:             case AllowOther of
 3710:                 false ->
 3711:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 3712:                 true ->
 3713:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 3714:             end
 3715:     after 0 ->
 3716:             N
 3717:     end.
 3718: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3719:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3720:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3721:     receive
 3722:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3723:             receive
 3724:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3725:                     hej = Reason1
 3726:             end
 3727:     end,
 3728:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3729:     receive
 3730:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3731:             hej = Reason2
 3732:     end,
 3733:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3734:     receive
 3735:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 3736:             hej = Reason3
 3737:     end,
 3738:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3739:     ok.
 3740: 
 3741: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3742:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 3743:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 3744:     try
 3745:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 3746:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3747:         %% of spawn requests...
 3748:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3749:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 3750:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3751:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3752:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 3753:         ok
 3754:     after
 3755:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 3756:     end.
 3757: 
 3758: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3759:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 3760:     %% ei node above
 3761:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 3762:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 3763:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 3764:     %% be supported.
 3765:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 3766:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 3767:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 3768:                              {match,_} ->
 3769:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 3770:                              nomatch ->
 3771:                                  Acc
 3772:                          end
 3773:                  end, [], os:env()),
 3774:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 3775:                       OldRelName,
 3776:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 3777: 	not_available ->
 3778:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 3779:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 3780:             try
 3781:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3782:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3783:                 %% of spawn requests...
 3784:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3785:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 3786:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3787:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3788:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 3789:                 ok
 3790:             after
 3791:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 3792:             end
 3793:     end.
 3794: 
 3795: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3796:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3797:     try
 3798:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3799:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3800:         %% of spawn requests...
 3801:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3802:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 3803:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3804:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3805:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 3806:         ok
 3807:     after
 3808:         peer:stop(Peer)
 3809:     end.
 3810: 
 3811: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3812:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 3813:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3814:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3815:     receive
 3816:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 3817:             error = Err,
 3818:             notsup = Notsup,
 3819:             ok
 3820:     end,
 3821:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 3822:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3823:     try
 3824:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 3825:     catch
 3826:         error:notsup ->
 3827:             ok
 3828:     end,
 3829:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 3830:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3831:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3832:     receive
 3833:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 3834:             notsup = R0
 3835:     end,
 3836:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 3837:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3838:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3839:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3840:     receive
 3841:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 3842:             notsup = R1
 3843:     end,
 3844:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 3845:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3846:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3847:     receive
 3848:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 3849:             notsup = R2
 3850:     end,
 3851:     ok.
 3852: 
 3853: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 3854:     ok;
 3855: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 3856:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 3857:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 3858:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 3859:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 3860:     end.
 3861: 
 3862: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3863:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 3864:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3865:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3866:     receive
 3867:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3868:             Node = node(P1),
 3869:             receive
 3870:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 3871:             end
 3872:     end,
 3873:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 3874:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3875:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3876:     receive
 3877:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 3878:     end,
 3879:     Node = node(P2),
 3880:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 3881:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3882:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3883:     receive
 3884:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 3885:     end,
 3886:     Node = node(P3),
 3887:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 3888:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3889:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3890:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3891:     Node = node(P4),
 3892:     receive
 3893:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 3894:             ok
 3895:     end,
 3896:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 3897:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3898:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3899:     Node = node(P5),
 3900:     receive
 3901:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 3902:             ok
 3903:     end.
 3904: 
 3905: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3906:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 3907:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3908:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 3909:     
 3910: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 3911:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 3912:     Parent = self(),
 3913:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 3914:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 3915:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 3916:     receive
 3917:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 3918:     after 0 ->
 3919:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 3920:     end,
 3921:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 3922:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 3923:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 3924:     receive
 3925:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 3926:     after 0 ->
 3927:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 3928:     end,
 3929:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 3930:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 3931:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 3932:     receive
 3933:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 3934:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3935:     after 0 ->
 3936:             ok
 3937:     end,
 3938:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 3939:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 3940:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 3941:     receive
 3942:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 3943:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3944:     after 0 ->
 3945:             ok
 3946:     end,
 3947:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 3948:     receive
 3949:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 3950:     end,
 3951:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 3952:     receive
 3953:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3954:     after 1000 -> ok
 3955:     end,
 3956:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 3957:     receive
 3958:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 3959:     end,
 3960:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 3961:     receive
 3962:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3963:     after 1000 -> ok
 3964:     end,
 3965:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 3966:     receive
 3967:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 3968:     end,
 3969:     case Node == node() of
 3970:         true ->
 3971:             ok;
 3972:         false ->
 3973:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3974:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 3975:             receive
 3976:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 3977:             end,
 3978:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 3979:             receive
 3980:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3981:             after 1000 -> ok
 3982:             end,
 3983:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 3984:             receive
 3985:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 3986:             end,
 3987:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 3988:             receive
 3989:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3990:             after 1000 -> ok
 3991:             end,
 3992:             ok
 3993:     end.
 3994: 
 3995: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3996:     Tester = self(),
 3997: 
 3998:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 3999:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4000:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4001:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4002:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4003:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4004:                       end),
 4005:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4006:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4007:           end,
 4008: 
 4009:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4010:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4011:     %% by its employer.
 4012:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4013:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4014: 
 4015:     ok.
 4016: 
 4017: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4018: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4019:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4020:         1 ->
 4021:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4022:         NScheds ->
 4023:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4024:     end.
 4025: 
 4026: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4027:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4028:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4029:     Tester = self(),
 4030: 
 4031:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4032:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4033:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4034:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4035:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4036:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4037:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4038:                 end)
 4039:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4040: 
 4041:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4042:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4043:         spawn_opt(
 4044:           fun() ->
 4045:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4046:           end,
 4047:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4048: 
 4049:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4050:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4051:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4052: 
 4053:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4054:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4055:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4056:                                     IgnorePids),
 4057:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4058:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4059:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4060:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4061:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4062:                     end,
 4063:                     {0, []},
 4064:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4065:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4066:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4067:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4068:     ok.
 4069: 
 4070: 
 4071: 
 4072: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4073:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4074:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4075:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4076:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4077:                                     Msg,
 4078:                                     IgnorePids),
 4079:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4080:     after 0 ->
 4081:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4082:     end.
 4083: 
 4084: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4085:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4086:         false ->
 4087:             Pid ! Msg;
 4088:         true ->
 4089:             ignore
 4090:     end,
 4091:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4092: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4093:     ok.
 4094: 
 4095: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4096:     link(Tester),
 4097:     case receive_any() of
 4098:         processes_send_infant ->
 4099:             case Parent of
 4100:                 Tester -> ok;
 4101:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4102:             end,
 4103:             Self = self(),
 4104:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4105:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4106:                                                                     Self,
 4107:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4108:                               end,
 4109:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4110:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4111:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4112: 
 4113:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4114:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4115:     end.
 4116: 
 4117: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4118:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4119:     case receive_any() of
 4120:         processes_send_infant ->
 4121:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4122:         {die, Child} ->
 4123:             ok;
 4124:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4125:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4126:             %% so we relay it.
 4127:             Child ! Stop
 4128:     end.
 4129: 
 4130: 
 4131: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4132: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4133: 
 4134: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4135:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4136:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4137: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4138: 	    not_enabled;
 4139: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4140: 	    not_enabled;
 4141: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4142:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4143:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4144: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4145: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4146:                     ok;
 4147: 		Blks ->
 4148:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4149:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4150:                           actual, Blks})
 4151: 	    end
 4152:     end,
 4153:     ok.
 4154: 
 4155: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4156:     Tester = self(),
 4157:     enable_internal_state(),
 4158:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4159:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4160:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4161:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4162: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4163: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4164:     } = PBInfo,
 4165:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4166:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4167:     Processes = fun () ->
 4168: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4169: 		WantReds),
 4170: 	    processes()
 4171:     end,
 4172:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4173: 	    unlink(P),
 4174: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4175: 	    wait_until(
 4176: 		fun () ->
 4177: 			not lists:member(
 4178: 			    P,
 4179: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4180: 				processes))
 4181: 		end)
 4182:     end,
 4183:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4184: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4185: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4186: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4187: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4188: 						   done,
 4189: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4190: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4191: 				 end),
 4192: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4193: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4194: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4195: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4196: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4197: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4198: 		  P
 4199: 	  end,
 4200:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4201: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4202: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4203: 				end,
 4204:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4205:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4206:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4207:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4208:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4209:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4210:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4211:     Exit(HA1),
 4212:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4213:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4214:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4215:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4216:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4217:     Exit(HA2),
 4218:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4219:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4220:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4221:     Exit(HA3),
 4222:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4223:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4224:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4225:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4226:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4227:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4228:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4229:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4230:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4231:     Exit(S1),
 4232:     Exit(S2),
 4233:     Exit(S3),
 4234:     Exit(S4),
 4235: 
 4236: 
 4237:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4238:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4239:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4240:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4241:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4242:     Exit(HA4),
 4243:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4244:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4245:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4246:     Exit(HA5),
 4247:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4248:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4249:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4250:     Exit(HA6),
 4251:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4252:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4253:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4254: 
 4255:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4256:     Exit(S8),
 4257:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4258:     Exit(S5),
 4259:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4260:     Exit(S7),
 4261:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4262:     Exit(S6),
 4263:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4264:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4265:     as_expected.
 4266: 
 4267: 
 4268: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4269:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4270: 
 4271: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4272:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4273: 
 4274: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4275:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4276: 
 4277: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4278:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4279: 
 4280: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4281:     T = self(),
 4282:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4283: 		receive
 4284: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4285: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4286: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4287: 			receive
 4288: 			after 10 ->
 4289: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4290: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4291: 			end;
 4292: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4293: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4294: 			To ! Msg
 4295: 		end
 4296: 	end),
 4297:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4298: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4299: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4300: 		case Type of
 4301: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4302: 		Type == waiting ->
 4303: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4304: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4305: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4306: 			    receive
 4307: 				_ ->
 4308: 				    ok
 4309: 			    after 0 ->
 4310: 				    F(F)
 4311: 			    end
 4312: 		    end,
 4313: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4314: 	    end,
 4315: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4316: 	    id(X)
 4317:     end),
 4318:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4319:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4320:     case Type of
 4321: 	      suspended ->
 4322: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4323: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4324: 	      waiting ->
 4325: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4326: 	      resume ->
 4327: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4328: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4329: 	  end,
 4330:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4331:     case Type of
 4332: 	      suspended ->
 4333: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4334: 	      _ ->
 4335: 		  ok
 4336: 	  end,
 4337:     receive
 4338: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4339: 		  ok
 4340: 	  after 2000 ->
 4341: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4342: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4343: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4344: 	  end,
 4345:     ok.
 4346: 
 4347: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4348:     receive
 4349: 	drop_me ->
 4350: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4351: 	{From, reds} ->
 4352: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4353: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4354: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4355: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4356:     after 0 ->
 4357: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4358:     end.
 4359: 
 4360: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4361:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4362:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4363:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4364: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4365: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4366: 					 _ -> ok
 4367: 				     end,
 4368: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4369: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4370: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4371: 				     receive
 4372: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4373: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4374: 						   NewReds
 4375: 					   end
 4376: 			     end,
 4377: 			     0,
 4378: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4379:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4380:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4381:     receive
 4382: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4383: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4384: 	  end,
 4385:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4386:     ok.
 4387: 
 4388: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4389:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4390:     Master = self(),
 4391:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4392:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4393: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4394:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4395: 					       tok_loop()
 4396: 				       end,
 4397: 				       [{priority, high},
 4398:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4399:                                         monitor,
 4400:                                         link])
 4401: 		     end,
 4402: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4403:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4404:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4405: 			    tok_loop()
 4406: 		    end,
 4407: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4408:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4409:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4410:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4411: 			  unlink(P),
 4412: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4413: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4414:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4415: 			  receive
 4416: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4417: 				  ok
 4418: 			  end
 4419: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4420:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4421:     ok.
 4422: 
 4423: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4424:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4425:     Master = self(),
 4426:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4427:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4428: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4429:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4430: 					       tok_loop()
 4431: 				       end,
 4432: 				       [{priority, max},
 4433:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4434:                                         monitor, link])
 4435: 		     end,
 4436: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4437:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4438:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4439: 			       tok_loop()
 4440: 		       end,
 4441: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4442:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4443:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4444:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4445:     receive
 4446: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4447: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4448:     after 1000 ->
 4449: 	    ok
 4450:     end,
 4451:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4452:     receive
 4453: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4454: 	    ok
 4455:     end,
 4456:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4457: 			  unlink(P),
 4458: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4459: 		  end, MTLs),
 4460:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4461: 			  receive
 4462: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4463: 				  ok
 4464: 			  end
 4465: 		  end, MTLs),
 4466:     receive
 4467: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4468: 	    ok
 4469:     end,
 4470:     receive
 4471: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4472: 	    ok
 4473:     end,
 4474:     receive
 4475: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4476: 	    ok
 4477:     end,
 4478:     unlink(PL),
 4479:     exit(PL, kill),
 4480:     receive
 4481: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4482: 	    ok
 4483:     end,
 4484:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4485:     ok.
 4486: 
 4487: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4488:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4489:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4490:     Ref.
 4491: 
 4492: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4493:     Me = self(),
 4494:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4495: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4496: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4497: 					  receive
 4498: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4499: 						  ok
 4500: 					  end
 4501: 				  end, RL),
 4502: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4503: 	    end,
 4504:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4505:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4506: 			  receive
 4507: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4508: 				  ok
 4509: 			  end
 4510: 		  end, HTLs),
 4511:     ok.
 4512: 
 4513: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4514:     [];
 4515: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4516:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4517:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4518:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4519:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4520:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4521: 
 4522: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4523:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4524: 				   tok_loop()
 4525: 			   end),
 4526:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4527:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4528:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4529:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4530:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4531:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4532:     exit(P, kill),
 4533:     receive
 4534: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4535: 	    ok
 4536:     end.
 4537: 
 4538: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4539: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4540: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4541: %% double-free at best.
 4542: %%
 4543: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4544: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4545: %% process is running dirty code.
 4546: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4547:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4548:         N when N > 0 ->
 4549:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4550:         _ ->
 4551:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4552:     end.
 4553: 
 4554: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4555:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4556: 
 4557:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4558:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4559:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4560:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4561: 
 4562:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4563: 
 4564:     [begin
 4565:          unlink(Pid),
 4566:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4567:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4568: 
 4569:     ok.
 4570: 
 4571: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4572:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4573:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4574:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4575:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4576:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4577:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4578:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4579: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4580:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 4581:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 4582:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 4583:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4584: 
 4585: dirty_loop() ->
 4586:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 4587:     dirty_loop().
 4588: 
 4589: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4590:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4591:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 4592:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 4593:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 4594: 
 4595: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 4596:     Master = self(),
 4597:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4598: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4599: 								    false),
 4600: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4601: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4602: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 4603: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4604: 								     true),
 4605: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4606: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4607:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4608:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 4609:                 ref -> make_ref();
 4610:                 immed -> immed
 4611:             end,
 4612:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 4613:     receive
 4614: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 4615: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 4616: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 4617: 	    ok
 4618:     end,
 4619:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 4620:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4621:     ok.
 4622: 
 4623: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4624:     Master = self(),
 4625:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4626:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4627: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4628: 								    false),
 4629: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4630: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4631: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4632: 								     true),
 4633: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4634: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4635:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4636:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4637: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 4638: 				       0 -> max;
 4639: 				       1 -> high;
 4640: 				       2 -> normal;
 4641: 				       3 -> low
 4642: 				   end,
 4643: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4644: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 4645: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 4646: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4647:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 4648: 			  receive
 4649: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 4650: 				  ok
 4651: 			  end
 4652: 		  end,
 4653: 		  PMs),
 4654:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 4655:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4656:     ok.
 4657: 
 4658: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4659:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4660:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 4661:                   end,
 4662:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 4663:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 4664:     unlink(P),
 4665:     exit(P, kill),
 4666:     ok.
 4667: 
 4668: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4669:     %%
 4670:     %% Whitebox testing...
 4671:     %%
 4672:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 4673:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 4674:     %%
 4675:     process_flag(priority, high),
 4676:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 4677:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4678:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 4679:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4680:                         lists:foreach(
 4681:                           fun (N) ->
 4682:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 4683:                                     Pid,
 4684:                                     Prio,
 4685:                                     {system_task_test,
 4686:                                      {Prio, N}})
 4687:                           end,
 4688:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4689:                 end,
 4690:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4691:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4692:                                           {system_task_test,
 4693:                                            {Prio, N},
 4694:                                            true}
 4695:                                   end,
 4696:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4697:                 end,
 4698: 
 4699:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 4700: 
 4701:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4702:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 4703:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 4704:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 4705: 
 4706:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 4707:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 4708: 
 4709:     ExpMsgs1 =
 4710:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4711:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4712:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4713:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4714:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 4715:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 4716:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 4717:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 4718:     
 4719:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 4720:         true ->
 4721:             ok;
 4722:         false ->
 4723:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 4724:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 4725:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4726:     end,
 4727: 
 4728:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 4729:     after 500 -> ok
 4730:     end,
 4731: 
 4732:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 4733: 
 4734:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 4735: 
 4736:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4737:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 4738: 
 4739:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 4740:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 4741: 
 4742:     ExpMsgs2 =
 4743:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4744:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4745:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4746:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4747:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 4748:     
 4749:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 4750:         true ->
 4751:             ok;
 4752:         false ->
 4753:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 4754:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 4755:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4756:     end,
 4757: 
 4758:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 4759:     after 500 -> ok
 4760:     end,
 4761: 
 4762:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 4763: 
 4764:     unlink(Pid),
 4765:     exit(Pid, kill),
 4766:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 4767:     ok.
 4768: 
 4769: alias_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4770:     alias_bif_test(node()),
 4771:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4772:     alias_bif_test(Node),
 4773:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4774:     ok.
 4775: 
 4776: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 4777:     A1 = alias(),
 4778:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4779:                              fun () ->
 4780:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4781:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4782:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4783:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4784:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 4785:                              end),
 4786:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4787:     unalias(A1),
 4788:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 4789:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4790: 
 4791:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 4792:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4793:                              fun () ->
 4794:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4795:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4796:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4797:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4798:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 4799:                              end),
 4800:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4801:     unalias(A2),
 4802:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 4803:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4804:     
 4805:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 4806:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4807:                               fun () ->
 4808:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4809:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 4810:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 4811:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 4812:                               end),
 4813:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4814:     ok.
 4815:              
 4816: 
 4817: monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4818:     monitor_alias_test(node()),
 4819:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4820:     monitor_alias_test(Node),
 4821:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4822:     ok.
 4823: 
 4824: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 4825:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 4826:                fun () ->
 4827:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4828:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4829:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4830:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4831:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4832:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 4833:                end),
 4834:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 4835:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 4836:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4837:     unalias(MA1),
 4838:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 4839:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4840: 
 4841:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 4842:                fun () ->
 4843:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4844:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4845:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4846:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4847:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4848:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 4849:                end),
 4850:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 4851:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 4852:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4853:     demonitor(MA2),
 4854:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 4855:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 4856:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4857: 
 4858:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 4859:                fun () ->
 4860:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4861:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4862:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 4863:                end),
 4864:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 4865:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 4866:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 4867:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4868:                                   fun () ->
 4869:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 4870:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 4871:                                   end),
 4872:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4873:     
 4874:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 4875:                fun () ->
 4876:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 4877:                end),
 4878:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 4879:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 4880:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4881:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4882:                                   fun () ->
 4883:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 4884:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 4885:                                   end),
 4886:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4887: 
 4888:     P5 = spawn(Node,
 4889:                fun () ->
 4890:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4891:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},
 4892:                        A5 ! {A5, 2}
 4893:                end),
 4894:     MA5 = monitor(process, P5, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 4895:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 4896:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 4897:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4898: 
 4899:     ok.
 4900:     
 4901: 
 4902: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4903:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 4904:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 4905:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 4906:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 4907:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 4908:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 4909:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4910:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 4911:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4912:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 4913:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4914:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 4915:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4916:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 4917:     ok.
 4918: 
 4919: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 4920:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 4921:                 spawn_opt ->
 4922:                     fun (F, O) ->
 4923:                             try
 4924:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 4925:                             catch
 4926:                                 error:Err ->
 4927:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 4928:                             end
 4929:                     end;
 4930:                 spawn_request ->
 4931:                     fun (F, O) ->
 4932:                             try
 4933:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 4934:                                 receive
 4935:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 4936:                                         {P, ReqId};
 4937:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 4938:                                         error(Error)
 4939:                                 end
 4940:                             catch
 4941:                                 error:Err ->
 4942:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 4943:                             end
 4944:                     end
 4945:             end,
 4946: 
 4947:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 4948:                          try
 4949:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 4950:                              error(ignored_error)
 4951:                          catch
 4952:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 4953:                                  ok;
 4954:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 4955:                                  ok
 4956:                          end
 4957:                  end,
 4958: 
 4959:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 4960:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 4961:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 4962:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 4963:     
 4964:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 4965:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4966:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4967:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4968:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4969:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4970:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 4971:                               exit(ExitReason)
 4972:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 4973:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 4974:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4975:     unalias(MA1),
 4976:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 4977:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4978: 
 4979:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 4980:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4981:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4982:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4983:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4984:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4985:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 4986:                               exit(ExitReason)
 4987:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 4988:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 4989:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4990:     demonitor(MA2),
 4991:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 4992:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 4993:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4994: 
 4995:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 4996:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4997:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4998:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 4999:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5000:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5001:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5002:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5003:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5004:                                   fun () ->
 5005:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5006:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5007:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5008:                                   end),
 5009:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5010:     
 5011:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5012:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5013:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5014:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5015:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5016:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5017:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5018:                                   fun () ->
 5019:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5020:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5021:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5022:                                   end),
 5023:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5024: 
 5025:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5026:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5027:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5028:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5029:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5030:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5031:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5032:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5033:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5034: 
 5035:     case Node == node() of
 5036:         true ->
 5037:             ok;
 5038:         false ->
 5039:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5040:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5041:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5042:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5043:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5044:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5045:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5046:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5047:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5048:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5049:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5050:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5051:                                           end),
 5052:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5053:     
 5054:             ok
 5055:     end.
 5056: 
 5057: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5058:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5059:     Fun = fun () ->
 5060:                   receive
 5061:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5062:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5063:                   end
 5064:           end,
 5065:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5066:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5067:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5068:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5069:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5070:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5071:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5072:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5073:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5074:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5075:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5076:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5077:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5078:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5079:     ok.
 5080: 
 5081: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5082:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5083:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5084:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5085:                  fun () ->
 5086:                          receive
 5087:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5088:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5089:                          end
 5090:                  end),
 5091:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5092:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5093:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5094:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5095:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5096:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5097:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5098:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5099:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5100:     ok.
 5101: 
 5102: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5103:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5104:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5105:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5106:     %% compound tags.
 5107:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5108:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5109:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5110:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5111:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5112:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5113:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5114:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5115:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5116:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5117:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5118:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5119:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5120:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5121:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5122:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5123:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5124:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5125:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5126:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5127:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5128:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5129:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5130:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5131:     ok.
 5132: 
 5133: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5134: 
 5135:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5136:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5137:     P1 ! go,
 5138:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5139: 
 5140:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5141:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5142: 
 5143:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5144:                 spawn_opt ->
 5145:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5146:                             try
 5147:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5148:                             catch
 5149:                                 error:Err ->
 5150:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5151:                             end
 5152:                     end;
 5153:                 spawn_request ->
 5154:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5155:                             try
 5156:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5157:                                 receive
 5158:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5159:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5160:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5161:                                         error(Error)
 5162:                                 end
 5163:                             catch
 5164:                                 error:Err ->
 5165:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5166:                             end
 5167:                     end
 5168:             end,
 5169: 
 5170:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5171:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5172: 
 5173:     case Node == node() of
 5174:         true ->
 5175:             ok;
 5176:         false ->
 5177:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5178:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5179:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5180:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5181: 
 5182:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5183:                 true ->
 5184:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5185:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5186:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5187:                 false ->
 5188:                     ok
 5189:             end,
 5190:             ok
 5191:     end.
 5192: 
 5193: no_pid_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5194:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5195:     SOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 5196:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5197:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5198:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5199:     ChkSpwndPid = fun () ->
 5200:                           check_spawned_pid(Pid)
 5201:                   end,
 5202:     MPs = maps:from_list(lists:map(fun (_) ->
 5203:                                            {P, M} = spawn_monitor(ChkSpwndPid),
 5204:                                            {M, P}
 5205:                                    end, lists:seq(1, SOnln))),
 5206:     Res = receive
 5207:               {'DOWN', M, process, _, pid_reused} when is_map_key(M, MPs) ->
 5208:                   case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 5209:                       8 ->
 5210:                           ct:fail("Process identifier reused"),
 5211:                           error;
 5212:                       4 ->
 5213:                           {comment,
 5214:                            "Process identifer reused, but this is"
 5215:                            ++ "expected since this is a 32-bit system"}
 5216:                   end;
 5217:               {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5218:                   ct:fail({unexpected_down, Down}),
 5219:                   error
 5220:           after
 5221:               3*60*1000 ->
 5222:                   ok
 5223:           end,
 5224:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5225:                          exit(P, kill)
 5226:                  end, MPs),
 5227:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5228:                          false = is_process_alive(P)
 5229:                  end, MPs),
 5230:     Res.
 5231: 
 5232: check_spawned_pid(OldPid) ->
 5233:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5234:     case OldPid == Pid of
 5235:         false ->
 5236:             check_spawned_pid(OldPid);
 5237:         true ->
 5238:             exit(pid_reused)
 5239:     end.
 5240: 
 5241: %% Internal functions
 5242: 
 5243: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5244:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5245: 
 5246: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5247:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5248: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5249:     receive
 5250:         Msg ->
 5251:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5252:     end.
 5253: 
 5254: wait_until(Fun) ->
