 5255:     case Fun() of
 5256: 	true -> true;
 5257: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5258:     end.
 5259: 
 5260: tok_loop() ->
 5261:     tok_loop(hej).
 5262: 
 5263: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5264:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5265: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5266:     tok_loop(hej).
 5267: 
 5268: id(I) -> I.
 5269: 
 5270: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5271:     verify_nc(node()),
 5272:     verify_nc(Node),
 5273:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5274: 
 5275: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5276:     P = self(),
 5277:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5278:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5279:                 fun() ->
 5280:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5281:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5282:                 end),
 5283:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5284:     receive
 5285:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5286:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5287:             ok;
 5288:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5289:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5290:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5291:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5292:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5293:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5294:     end.
 5295: 
 5296: enable_internal_state() ->
 5297:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5298: 	true -> true;
 5299: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5300:     end.
 5301: 
 5302: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5303:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5304:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5305:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5306:     case total_memory() of
 5307: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5308: 	    TestFun();
 5309: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5310: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5311: 	undefined ->
 5312: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5313:     end.
 5314: 
 5315: 
 5316: total_memory() ->
 5317:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5318:     try
 5319: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5320:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5321:                available_memory, SMD,
 5322:                proplists:get_value(
 5323:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5324:                  proplists:get_value(
 5325:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5326:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5327:     catch
 5328: 	_ : _ ->
 5329: 	    undefined
 5330:     end.
 5331: 
 5332: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5333:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5334:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5335:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5336:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5337:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5338:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5339:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5340:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5341:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5342:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5343:     Parent = self(),
 5344:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5345:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5346:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5347:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5348:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5349:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5350:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5351:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5352:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5353:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5354:                              receive
 5355:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5356:                              end,
 5357:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5358:                      end),
 5359:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5360:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5361:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5362:         Error -> Error
 5363:     end.
 5364: 
 5365: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5366:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5367:     case get(Key) of
 5368:         undefined ->
 5369:             {error, no_handler};
 5370:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5371:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5372:             receive
 5373:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5374:                     Res
 5375:             after 3000 ->
 5376:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5377:             end
 5378:     end.
 5379: 
 5380: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5381:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5382:         ok ->
 5383:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5384:             case get(Key) of
 5385:                 undefined ->
 5386:                     {error, no_handler};
 5387:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5388:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5389:                     receive
 5390:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5391:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5392:                             ok
 5393:                     after 2000 ->
 5394:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5395:                     end
 5396:             end;
 5397:         Error ->
 5398:             Error
 5399:     end.
 5400: 
 5401: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5402:     receive
 5403:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5404:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5405:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5406:             exit(Reason);
 5407:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5408:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5409:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5410:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5411:             exit(normal);
 5412:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5413:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5414:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5415:             receive
 5416:                 Ref ->
 5417:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5418:             after
 5419:                 2000 ->
 5420:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5421:             end;
 5422:         Msg ->
 5423:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5424:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5425:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5426:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5427:     end,
 5428:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5429: 
 5430: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5431:     receive
 5432:         Msg ->
 5433:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5434:     after
 5435:         0 ->
 5436:             Msgs
 5437:     end.
 5438: 
 5439: get_hostname() ->
 5440:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5441: 
 5442: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5443:     HostName;
 5444: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5445:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5446: 
 5447: receive_any() ->
 5448:     receive M -> M end.
